bug.author: edwardyehuang
bug.summary: tf.keras.Model.compile unexpectedly recovered old optimizer iterations
bug.description:
System information
TensorFlow version (use command below):2.4 nightly GCC/Compiler version (if compiling from source): CUDA/cuDNN version: 11 GPU model and memory: Titan RTX
After I set a new optimizer in tf.keras.Model.compile. The "iterations" become previous trained iterations

comments.comment: Currently I am using model.optimizer.iterations.assign(0) to fix this isuse after compiled

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/edwardyehuang>@edwardyehuang</denchmark-link> , In order to expedite the trouble-shooting process, could you please provide the complete code to reproduce the issue reported here and also the dataset you are using. Thanks!
